Package controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
controller.Controller
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
The class Controller is a class that represents the controller part of MVC. It has coupling issues between itself and the DisplayGUI, however, it completely seperates the view from interacting with the model. It also starts and runs the solitaire game. It maintains the state of the solitaire game and receives incoming user input from the view.
Version:
2020-12-10
Author:
Devon X. Dalrymple

  • Method Details

    • getController

      public static Controller getController()
      Creates a controller singleton if it does not currently exist. Returns the singleton for use.
      Returns:
      Controller singleton

    • runGameLoop

      public void runGameLoop()
      Runs the game after setting up the necessary variables. Will allow user input to be made and will handle the turns, time and the like. The backbone heart of the game it will keep everything updated as necessary to provide a good experience for the user.

    • selectCard

      public void selectCard​(int option)
      It does one of three things depending on the given circumstances:
      • If no card column is selected, it selects it
      • If the card column that is selected is the same as the card column specified, it deselects it
      • If a card column is selected but the one chosen is different, the card is moved from the source to the destination.
      The user will notice if the move was not legal or otherwise could not be done. There is a number of options:
      • The four free cells can be selected with 1-4 with one being the leftmost and four the rightmost.
      • The four foundations can be selected with 5-8 with five being the leftmost and eight the rightmost.
      • The eight card columns can be selected with 9-16 with nine being the leftmost and sixteen the rightmost.
      If a move is made and all works well, it will update the display and process the move.
      Parameters:
      option - The option from the options listed above (a value between 1-16)

    • readConfig

      public int readConfig​(java.lang.String key)
      Reads the configuration information and returns it
      Parameters:
      key - The key to find the value
      Returns:
      The value assigned to the key

    • alterConfig

      public boolean alterConfig​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> dataToAlter)
      Tells the controller to change configuration settings
      Parameters:
      dataToAlter - The keys with the values they should be changed to (No vertical pipes or semicolons)
      Returns:
      true if the config was altered

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      Calls the game to end by the player.

    • restartGame

      public void restartGame()
      Calls the game to be restarted by the player
